modShortDescription: Tired of harvesting scrap polymers? This 7 Days to Die mod allows you to craft scrap polymers. 50 gas cans equals 1 scrap polymer in the chemistry station.
modDescription:
Tired of harvesting scrap polymers? This 7 Days to Die mod allows you to craft scrap polymers. The new A18 (b152) now requires 2 scrap polymers to craft steel arrows and bolts (replacement for wood and feathers). Feathers are rare enough, but scrap polymer is worse to harvest. Sure: It should be balanced, so Claymore chose to go the way of real life chemistry (almost). 50 gas cans equals 1 scrap polymer in the chemistry station.

Compatibility: A17+

[Download](https://www.mediafire.com/file/63hcaggmgkr19zy/Claymore_Craftable_ScrapPolymers.zip)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/15031-claymores-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Claymore](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/claymore/)
